open-mmlab/Amphion

Generates audio, music, and speech

View on index

Related repos

  • Generates songs with vocals and instrumentals from text prompts or audio references
  • Web-based audio and waveform editor
  • Generates binaural audio from video and text
  • Transcodes Audible files into mp3 or m4b
  • open source audio model for expressive speech and voice cloning
  • Synthesizes speech without tokenizers
  • Generates playlists through sonic analysis of local audio files
  • open-source model for generating music from text or audio inputs
  • AudioCraft: code for generating music, sound effects, and audio compression from raw audio and textinputs
